articles.title: Election defeat looms for Trump's biggest Republican critic - News24
articles.description: Republican dissident Liz Cheney looks set to lose her US Congress seat Tuesday to an election-denying conspiracy theorist, in the latest signal of her party's disavowal of traditional conservatism in favor of Donald Trump's hardline "America First" m
articles.content:
• Liz Cheney,  daughter of former vice-president Dick Cheney, has represented Wyoming in the House since 2017.
  • She is the vice-chair of the congressional panel investigating the January… [+4003 chars]
